Module xcrysden¶

class pylastic.io.xcrysden.XCD(verbouse=False)¶

Module for generating xcrysden input files from atoms object.

trans_csystem(in_mat, out_mat, in_vec)¶

Transformation of coordinate system.

Parameters:
  • in_mat (3x3-matrix) – Old coordinate frame.
  • out_mat (3x3-matrix) – New coordinate frame.
  • in_vec (3-vector) – Vector to transform.
\[v_{out}= M_{in}^T M_{out}^T v_{in}\]
